abstract: An examination is made of a queueing system M vertical G vertical 1 vertical infinity with servicing discipline that gives at all times an advantage to orders with minimum remaining length. For a broad class of distribution functions of the servicing time under conditions of a high load, it is shown that the distribution of a normalized number of orders in the system in a stationary regime is asymptotically equivalent to an exponential distribution. An explicit expression is found for the normalization parameter.
